body.name: Vassink Ergonomic Mouse, Rechargeable Wireless Mouse, 2.4GHz Rechargeable Wireless Vertical Optical Mice with USB Receiver, 6 Buttons, 800/1200/1600 DPI, for Laptop, PC, Computer Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 2 hrs 40 mins
features: ☛【Ergonomics-Wireless Mouse】The vertical wireless ergonomic mouse is designed to fit the size and contour of the palm, reducing the pressure on the palm and making your control of the wireless mice more comfortable and natural.

★【Efficient and Sensitive-Easy to Use】The ergonomic mouse has 6 convenient buttons design, plug and play; Adjustable 800/1200/1600 DPI mouse movement speed. Optical tracking technology has higher sensitivity than standard optical mouse, usable Smooth and precise tracking on a variety of surfaces.

☛【Quiet Design-Fashionable Charging】The wireless mouse adopts a button mute design, which is more suitable for public places such as libraries, dormitories, offices, high-speed rail planes, etc.; with built-in lithium battery and USB data cable charging device, making your use more fashionable Convenient.

★★★【Long Life-More Durable】The high-quality optical wireless mouse has been tested for over 5 million mouse clicks. The rechargeable feature makes this wireless mouse more durable.(It is better to use it after receiving the mouse fully charged)

☛【Strong Compatibility-Vassink Service】Support Windows 2000/ ME/ XP/ 7/ 8/ 10/ Vista/98, Mac OS, Linux, etc. Suitable for notebooks, PCs, laptops, computers, Macbooks and other equipment. We provide 12 months of worry-free after-sales service. If you encounter any problems with the wireless mouse during use, please feel free to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Red Hot Addition to My Workspace
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this shade of red. As someone who values both aesthetics and functionality, this mouse is impressive. Red happens to be my favorite color, and this mouse's vibrant red hue adds a touch of personality and style to my desk. It's a refreshing departure from the usual black or gray. It injects a burst of energy into my workspace.Beyond its visual appeal, the ergonomic design of this mouse is brilliant. The vertical orientation aligns perfectly with the natural posture of my hand, reducing strain and discomfort during long hours of use. What surprised me most was how quickly my hand adapted to this new design. It felt comfortable and intuitive right from the start, making it a smooth transition from my previous mouse.The rechargeable feature is a fantastic addition. No more fussing around with disposable batteries. The included USB receiver is easy to set up, and the mouse charges quickly using the included cable. It's a convenient and eco-friendly choice, which I appreciate.The six buttons on this mouse are well-placed and responsive. The 800/1200/1600 DPI settings offer versatility, allowing me to tailor the cursor speed to my preference for different tasks, whether it's precise design work or swift navigation across multiple screens.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels good in smaller hands easily, lightweight, colors are striking
reviews.reviewText: Edit about seller cus. service: I noticed the jumping issue with scroll wheel. I do see from other reviews that this is semi common and the issue I had with the iClever mouse. I saw on their seller page that they offer 12 mos. quality guarantee. I contacted them and asked for same mouse exchange. They offered to replace. They responded within 1 hour- Great communication and thank you! If you're having any scroll wheel issue- contact them!This is my 2nd ergo mouse I'm trying. First one was from iClever. The same concept of ~60 degree tilt, handshake grip which is more neutral for wrist. iClever (uses AA battery) has nice feeling and shape, but for my medium female hands, it felt too big, and the thumb rest position was too far away which caused more back of hand tension. And the clicks weren't as responsive. This Vassink one has rechargeable battery, so it's much lighter and the footprint is smaller and narrower. So far (2-3 days) it feels more comfortable in my hand. It's hard to know if it'll relieve my typical forearm pain. Usually one sees that over longer periods. But the clicks are more responsive. iClever has definite issues with scroll button where it jumps around. So far I don't see this here, but it's still new to me. I think with these ergo mice, you have to try them out to see if the fit is right for your hand. * side note I got the red color. It's not as bright, which I prefer. It's more metallic matte red- super pretty and adds nice subtle style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars First time trying one of these
reviews.reviewText: I have used mostly your standard type of mouse. I have a rollerball mouse for my laptop which I love, but it isn’t practical for work. I wanted to try something to help with wrist pain. The operation of this one is great. Smooth and quiet. My hand fit well around it, however it wasn’t great for me. Based on all the good reviews, I’m sure it’s just me, but my wrist actually hurt more with this one. I used it for a week and a half thinking I would just have to get used to it. I never did. Another issue is that picking up the mouse and repositioning on my mousepad was awkward and interrupted my flow. The last issue I had was I couldn’t get used to the height of it and kept knocking it over, making it click on something I didn’t want to click on.For me, it didn’t work, but the product itself was great, so it gets 4 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: When I first started using it, I was a little bothered by the left and right click being so quiet. I'm used to a "clicky" sounding mouse. But after using this for over a week now, I love how quiet it is. Battery Life seems pretty good. I haven't had to charge it yet, so that's nice. It has been on for over a week. I'm not turning it off at night after I leave work either. Forward and back buttons are a must for me. The only downside I have found is the sensitivity selector at the top doesn't have as many options as I'd like. But that's not a big deal.It's light, comfy, and the material feels nice in the hand. I have the USB receiver going through a USB extention, into a splitter hub and plugged into my computer trhough a thunderbolt port and it works great. Might just get another one as a backup.
Muy práctico y facil de adaptarse

reviews.reviewTitle: Unusable left click button and scroll wheel after a month of usage.
reviews.reviewText: The mouse had issues from the beginning now it's gotten much worse after a month of usage. The left click was unresponsive 2 out of 5 clicks, now it's more like 3 out of 5. The scroll wheel is barely functional. It has a mind of its own, scrolls all over the place if I scroll. Sometimes unresponsive. If feels as if its free scrolling without the clickiness. One scroll is enough to send a page all the way to the top or the bottom.I guess I got a damaged product, assumed it will get better after a week's usage, it didn't.The charge does not last as long as claimed but it is not at all disappointing. Same goes to Bluetooth range.Other than this, the build quality and the texture is good. Definitely improved my wrist pain. None of that matters because I can barely use the mouse anymore.

reviews.reviewTitle: No es el color de la imagen.
reviews.reviewText: El mouse es perfecto y funciona de maravilla (no es mi primer mouse ergonómico, por lo que sé que funciona) sin embargo, elegí este específicamente por el color turquesa (Azul / Patchwork) que se muestra en las imágenes para que combinara con mi lugar de trabajo y desafortunadamente es un color azul distinto. Por esta simple razón es que generaré la devolución tristemente porque esperé muchos días por él. El color no es feo, pero no combina con el resto de colores turquesa de mi escritorio. Ni modo :(

reviews.reviewerName: It is a waste product. It did not even work for a month. Waste of money. Don't ever buy this one. It is not working even if it is charged
reviews.reviewText: It is a waste product and did not even work for a month. It is not working even It is charged. Waste of money.
it stopped working within 1 month..me and my frnd we both ordered the same so both the mouse are not working...
